summary: Amy Smart  is an American actress and former fashion model.
full_text:
Amy Lysle Smart  is an American actress and former fashion model. Smart began her career modeling in Italy and subsequently enrolled in acting school. Her first role in film was in director Martin Kunert's film Campfire Tales. She has since appeared in numerous films including Road Trip ,The Butterfly Effect , Just Friends , Mirrors  and Tyler Perry's The Single Moms Club .
Smart has also starred on television shows Felicity , Smith  and Shameless .
title: Amy Smart
